definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: Bush was originally 10 side here is the local skies Taoist deity.
sentences.chinese: 這裏原是十方叢林，是雲遊道士掛單的地方。

sentences.english: Romantically , this month will be so strong it may amaze you, even if you are single.
sentences.chinese: 太浪漫了，這個月會讓你大喫一驚，哪怕你是掛單的。

definition: pipal tree (Ficus religiosa)/bo fig tree/Bodhi tree (sacred to Buddhism and Hinduism)
to visit a prisoner (usu. a relative or friend)
to equip/to fit out/to get ready (for a journey)/to arrange (clothes) to be ready
to read out/to recite/to remember sb (while talking about sth else)
to go to church on Sunday (of Christians)
